column2: ENGLISH

While perusing your pantries you come to an amazing realization, perhaps the Jade Emperor would enjoy sharing in them too! 'But it can't just be any old food', you tell yourself out loud startling a nearby servant, no no it must be an exquisite feast for such a person of importance.

While perusing your pantries you come to an interesting idea, perhaps the Jade Emperor would enjoy sharing in them too! But it can't just be any old food, you tell yourself, it must be an exquisite feast for such a person of importance.
Good thinking me!

In order to host this feast for the emperor you must decide on a menu. Your head chef has presented a set of 3 suggestions to choose from but of course you could just come up with one of your own. For the appetizer you decide on...
Smoked Salmon
Prime salmon caught fresh and smoked by finest artisans.
Cheese Stuffed Eggs
Hard boiled eggs replacing the yolk with the finest of soft cheese.
Roasted Milk
Milk prepared into a type of custard and then fried.
Special Meat Balls
I'm sure the chef knows what I mean by 'special balls'.

Just like the appetizer you are once again presented with a set of 3 choices for the primary dish. While there are many other foods being served alongside this choice it will become the centerpiece of the whole feast.
Ornate Pile of Water Fowl
A fine selection of duck, pigeon and goose arranged pleasantly to the eye.
Family of Cattle
A cow, a bull and several calves arranged in a circular shape.
Boar-on-the-spit
The classic boar with an exquisite arrangement of decorations surrounding it.
Horse-on-the-spit
Make sure there's an apple in the mouth!
The preparations are finally complete. The ingredients will be loaded onto carts and sent to the emperor to be prepared on site. You watch with glee as the livestock and goods are loaded onto carts.
Surely this will be a success
The feast will be sent off to the emperor.
On second thought, this is too delicious looking to send off
This will re-plan the feast to be held in your realm instead.
The Imperial Feast

Your feast caravan has finally returned completely bare and it seems to have been picked clean. A gleaming servant approaches you from the caravan saying that the emperor was very pleased with your feast, especially the '[Root.GetFeastMainDish]'. They were also rather pleased with the '[Root.GetFeastAppetizer]'. The emperor is requesting that you send more of it in the future.\nYou believe that this is most likely the start of a new trend in Eastern culinary experiences.

Your feast caravan has finally returned with a few leftovers but it's not as full as it was when you sent it out. A confused seeming servant approaches you from the caravan saying that the emperor was very ambivalent about your feast, especially the '[Root.GetFeastMainDish]'. The servant goes on to say that he could not read the mood of the feast.

Your feast caravan has finally returned. It returns with seemingly many leftovers. An apprehensive servant approaches you from the caravan saying that the emperor was very displeased about your feast, especially the '[Root.GetFeastMainDish]'. The servant goes on to say that barely any of the food they brought was eaten and were told by the emperor's men to take it back with us.

Your feast caravan has finally returned with seemingly many leftovers. An apprehensive servant approaches you from the caravan saying that the emperor was very displeased about your feast, especially the '[Root.GetTerribleDish]'. The servant goes on to say that barely any of the food they brought was eaten and even worse were told by the emperor's men to take it back with us.
Fantastic!
Is... that good?
They didn't like it? Idiots, all of them
